subject: Football
Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Riley Nelson threw three touchdown passes to Cody Hoffman, the last with 11 seconds left, and Brigham Young beat Tulsa, 24-21, in the Armed Forces Bowl in Dallas.
snippet: Riley Nelson threw three touchdown passes to Cody Hoffman, the last with 11 seconds left, and Brigham Young beat Tulsa, 24-21, in the Armed Forces Bowl in Dallas.
